sentences.sentence: 'Get up, Jennet!' my mother shouted 'Come and help me!'
sentences.translation: “起来，詹妮特！”我妈妈喊道。“来给我帮忙！”

sentences.sentence: 'Jennet, bring the bottle! We need more drink!' shouted my mother.
sentences.translation: “詹妮特，把酒瓶拿来！我们得再喝点！”妈妈喊道。

sentences.sentence: It's all lies! Jennet, you're a witch-a child of the Devil! You're my daughter, and I know.
sentences.translation: 那全是谎言！詹妮特，你是个女巫——魔鬼的孩子！你是我女儿，我知道！
